You\'re right! You are partly right. Your answer is incorrect. // Sea anemone / Actinia This photo is taken in the shallow waters of the beach in Laguna Beach (California, USA). It\'s a Actinia or a Sea anemone. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sea_anemone // Cabo da Roca The photo shows the westernmost point of the Eurasian continent. What\'s the name of this place?

Cape Roca The most western point of Eurasia is Cape Roca. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cabo_da_Roca // Victoria harbour What is the name of this natural landform harbour situated between Hong Kong Island and Kowloon in Hong Kong? Victoria This harbor is called Victoria. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Victoria_Harbour // Звёздное дерево This is the highest TV tower in the world, located in Tokyo. What is it called?
Earth's Arrow

Sky Tree This tower is called \"Tokyo Sky Tree\". https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tokyo_Skytree // Other Error Unable to open link! Rotate the device to see the full image.
